plot: Woody Paris, police captain and loving husband, leads his team of detectives through the black and white and gray that constitutes the world of law and order.
plot_en: Woody Paris, police captain and loving husband, leads his team of detectives through the black and white and gray that constitutes the world of law and order.
plot_es: Woody Paris, police captain and loving husband, leads his team of detectives through the black and white and gray that constitutes the world of law and order.
title: Paris
